mapper.select: SELECT distinct sn.device_id as deviceId, sn.id as sensorId, sn.channel as channel, sn.sensor_content_id as sensorContentId, sc.channel_size as channelSize, sn.kst as kst, sn.sm as sm, ss.size as size, ss.dxd as dxd, ss.dxu as dxu, ss.rs as rs, sm.code as code FROM ph2_sensors sn JOIN ph2_sensor_sizes ss on sn.sensor_size_id=ss.id JOIN ph2_sensor_models sm on sn.sensor_model_id=sm.id JOIN ph2_sensor_contents sc on sn.sensor_content_id = sc.id WHERE sn.device_id = #{deviceId}
